option.name: description
option.value: This course provides an introduction to the standard Python logging module. It includes basic and advanced examples that can help you debug your Python software. Best practices are demonstrated to help you get the most out of Python logging. This course was tested using Python 2.7 and Python 3.4.

option.name: possible_answer
option.value: write a warning message to logging

option.name: possible_answer
option.value: write a warning message to logging
